name: ThreatConnect
description: ThreatConnect is a threat intelligence platform that enables security teams to aggregate, analyze, and operationalize threat data for improved security operations and incident response

externalIntegrations.name: TheHive Integration (via Polarity)
externalIntegrations.description: Polarity-TheHive integration that enables security analysts to search TheHive instances for indicators, create and manage cases, view case details including severity and status, and understand indicator context through summary tags for coordinated incident response
